data.text: Yahweh, our Lord, people all over the world know that you [MTY] are very great!
You have taught little children and infants to praise you;
When I look up at the sky at night,
it is amazing to me that [RHQ] you think about people,
You made the angels in heaven to be only a little more important than we are;
You put us in charge of everything that you made;
